thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Bradford Ellis
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Bradford Ellis

author: Bradford Ellis
title: Bradford Ellis
text:
Omega Rental @ Christchurch and Queenstown were more polite and much more friendly.They explained everything to us.
They were willing to work around our request.The only negative is that they open @ 8 am and that means we cant fly in earlier than 8 am.
